Configure Settings Open the app and click on the Settings icon. Now, tap on General. Here you can configure the settings on how you want to record calls and use those recordings. You can set a password, enable notification while the call is recording and group the recordings. Call Recorder General Settings General Settings Call Recorder General Settings Configure Recording Settings Open the Settings and click on Recording. Here, you can choose the recording directory, choose from 7 different recording file formats, enable auto-delete and choose whether you want to record the calls manually or automatically. Also, you can set a timer to start recording by tapping on Recording delay and entering the seconds that you want to delay before the recording starts. Also, you can record Bluetooth headset calls by checking the Record on Bluetooth option. Call Recorder Recording Settings Recording Options Enable Cloud Integration Optional The app also features Cloud integration for saving your phone recordings on Cloud. You can enable Cloud storage by going to the Settings menu and tapping on Cloud Services. You ll need to log in with your account details for whichever Cloud service you want to use. Call Recorder Cloud Cloud Services

Go to Settings Open the app and press the Menu key on your device. Now, select Settings from the list of options. Auttomatic Call Recorder Settings Settings Configure Settings While under Settings, make sure that the Record Calls option is checked. You can also configure things like the directory for saving your recordings, the recording file type and your Dropbox account for Cloud integration. Auttomatic Call Recorder Enable Recording Settings Now, you can make/receive a call and the app will automatically record every call. You will see a red icon in your status bar while the call is being recorded and you will get a notification once the call ends and the recording is saved. The Inbox tab is where all your recordings will be stored. These saved calls will be stored in the Saved tab. Auttomatic Call Recorder Icon Call Recording Automatic Call Recorder Files Recordings Play Your Recodings Now, go to the Inbox or Saved tab and click on the recording that you want to play and hit the Play button. You can also search for recordings in the recordings list by pressing your Menu key and tapping the Search button. Auttomatic Call Recorder Play Play Recordings
